column5: Old news up here.  And ps we don't want him back.
Ya, very old....was posted in yesterday's paper...and you WILL be getting him back....
First time I heard about it  just sayin......
Wasn't hi nick name the Village Idiot when he played?.... Or was thats Ties handle.
It was news on Sunday. ESPN fired him Monday.

Nice driving a cayene with a missing tire? I didn't like him when he played hockey, I didn't like him when he was on TV, and I don't like him now. Send him to Ottawa if you have to. Thats where us real canadian hockey fans send our useless washed up hasbeen's.
Ya, how loud do you have to have the radio to not hear that?
After 16 beers you tend not to hear very well
He's definitely got a few lug nuts loose.
He was a loser on the ice and now proving that he is one off the ice. I never understand how someone can throw away such amazing opportunities in life by making stupid decisions.
I met him and had a few beers with him back in 2008 at the Wayne Gretzky Classic golf event.  He was a rather nice guy but you could tell it was all a show.  It's sad to say but will he be next?
